profile.title: Professional profile
profile.introduction: Curious and passionate Web Developer with more than 5 years of experience in the design and development of web projects. Adept of functional programming and the KISS principle, I like the code to be well structured, clear and commented. Reactive and with a strong team spirit, my help is often appreciated to solve complicated problems or to take on new challenges.

list.title: Web developer at Botfuel
list.technologies: React.js, Axios, Styled Components, Node.js, MongoDB, Redis, Socket.io, JavaScript, TypeScript, CoffeeScript, Python, PHP, Gatsby.js, Grav
details: Development and maintenance of an ecosystem of customer support applications, including a back office using an API rest, an intelligent chat module, a dynamic FAQ display module and a server for the chat and FAQ module.
Deployment of various applications on Heroku and AWS using CI/CD pipelines.
Design and development of Botfuel Dialog, an open source SDK for developing chatbots.
Implementation of the Botfuel Dialog SDK as a web application usable by everyone.
Maintenance and translation of the company's website.
Development of features and maintenance of a chatbot client project.
Development of a proxy allowing the public, secure and unified use of the different APIs of the company.
Development of modules integrating the company customer support solution on Magento, Wordpress and Shopify websites.
